A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The townspeople are stopping anyone going near the house. Simon Runswick has gone to ask them to leave, but they reject that idea and Simon is arrested because he went inside the house with his gun drawn - he does this but also tries to get Mrs Harris and her son Bret Snider out of the house
